images.copyright: Bronze sculpture of child and his grandfather caring for plants and flowers, Cordoba, Spain (© David M G/Alamy)
images.title: A growing tradition
images.caption: The colourful courtyards of Córdoba
images.desc: Elaborately decorated courtyards filled with colourful flowers and plants set against whitewashed walls are a deep-rooted tradition in the Andalusian city of Córdoba, in the south of Spain. Our homepage sculpture, in the San Basilio district, pays tribute to those who take care of these vertical gardens that burst into life in the spring.
